1. Create a clean JBoss Fuse6.0 environment.
2. Enable user admin in the files <FUSE_HOME>/etc/users.properties and <FUSE_HOME>/etc/system.properties
3. Start my fuse
4. Create fabric with command "fabric-create"
5. Add FMC profile to root container
6. Apply patch 5 to my fabric in FMC.
6.1 Apply patch 3 prerequisites
6.2 Apply patch 5
7. Quit
Expected Result: Fuse can be shut down successfully.
Result: My fuse cannot be shut down.
